title: Bug 35156 - Ctrl+F1 works only on some fields in the help search
description: Users report that Ctrl+F1 functionality is inconsistent when used in the help search. Further details need to be provided.
OB: When using Ctrl+F1 in the help search, it is observed that the shortcut works only on certain fields, leading to an inconsistent user experience.
EB: Ctrl+F1 should consistently work on all fields within the help search, providing a uniform and expected behavior for users.
SR:
1. Open the help search feature.
2. Use Ctrl+F1 on different fields within the search.
3. Observe the inconsistency in the shortcut's functionality.
